title: Bloomberg Markets: Jesse Eisinger on White Collar Crimes
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Jesse Eisinger on White Collar Crimes
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Jesse Eisinger\u0010Senior Reporter and Author\u0010Pro Publica \u0010Discussing his book on why the Justice Department fails to prosecute executives. Paul Pelletier,\u0010Partner at Pepper Hamilton, and Kathryn Ruemmler, Partner and Global Co-Chair of the White Collar Defense & Investigations Practice at Latham & Watkins also participate in the conversation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
